section.para: To view Sales history by Product Category, select the "Sales History by Product Category" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying Sales history by Product Category, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display Sales history for all Product Categories.
Specify Product Category whose Sales history you want to display.
Enter a Product Category pattern to select a range of Product Categories. Refine your search using Regular Expressions.
Select to display Sales history by Product Category for all Sites.
Specify Site whose Sales history by Product Category you want to display.
Select to include Costs in the display.
Select to include Prices in the display.
Sales history by Product Category generated on or after this date will be displayed.
Sales history by Product Category generated on or before this date will be displayed.
Display lists Sales history by Product Category, using the specified parameters. Prices are normalized to the Base Currency using the Currency Exchange Rate effective on the Invoice Date.
